column4: OK I finally got my computer repaired and, I decided to install ubuntu. But now I can't figure out how to get my Internet to work. I am using a router that goes to my dads windows xp and its all connected to a cabel modem. Please help!
hey can someone give me a hand with a wirless usb network card
